website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic VX2475Smhl-4K is a 24-inch Ultra-High-Definition (UHD) monitor that offers the latest video inputs and a crisp 4K image.

customer_reviews.title: A good option until 4K monitors with higher frame rates come to the market.
customer_reviews.text: The most FPS you're going to get with this is 60 frames. I play SC II in full 4k, get very light screen tearing during the cinematics when using a GTX 1060. It's not barely noticeable and I've never had a problem during game play. When I first used it the screen tear was really bad, but I turned off antialiasing and everything has been great since then. I rather have gotten a monitor that was higher than 60 hz, but they didn't exists for under $500 when I bought this. Overall I'm happy but waiting to upgrade in two or three years.
customer_reviews.author: Tennek

customer_reviews.title: Simple 4K monitor with great picture quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great color and never gives any trouble waking up from sleep like some other monitors I've had. No frills monitor that does its primary job well. Good value
customer_reviews.author: ag

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. The controls at the bottom are practically unusable in the dark until you memorize their layout.
customer_reviews.author: Kris Shiflet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Monitor. True 4K res. Love it. a greta deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Arbelaez

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Met and exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Works great connected to my macbook pro & my windows 7 computer. Really happy with the quality, especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: jdiggydog

customer_reviews.title: Great for photo editing
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor and it displays over 100% of the Adobe RGB color space.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Works just awesome in 4K!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today and connected it to my EVGA GeForce GTX 1070 card with the included DisplayPort cable. 4K video on this is stunning. No dead pixels, ghosting, smudges, or anything. Just flawless. I bought this refurbished, and aside from slight cosmetic scratches on the black plastic outer bezel, no telling it apart from new. I'll be using this for HD video and high-resolution photo editing, and for that, it's just amazing, and at a GREAT price!
customer_reviews.author: SBH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor ! Mac Pro users will need a special cable for 60hz however
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor for the price ! If you are using with a Mac Pro, however, make sure to get a Mini-DV to DisplayPort 1.2 adapter, otherwise, you'll be running at 30hz refresh - You won't get the refresh rate you're looking for going over HDMI, unfortunately. Works great for PC's over HDMI, however.
customer_reviews.author: Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I now have 3 ViewSonic monitors. This one is perfect! I had a larger 4K but it started killing my neck. Many programs are still not made for 4K so the type is so small you start trying to zoom in to see with your head and neck. The larger the monitor the smaller the lettering and while the monitor lettering is adjustable, some programs are not. The colors are bright and seem perfect. I edit art and photography. I would highly suggest this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: PDS

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for software development. Text is as crisp as on Retina displays, but much larger. Pro Tip: set the resilution for this display at half the native resolution to get super smooth font. You still get more real estate than on the laptop screen
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Juan Liska

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect..
customer_reviews.text: Almost perfect... Got one from warehouse deals, can't beat a 4k monitor for 350 bucks. It's a gorgeous monitor, almost perfect, BUT... Inexplicably, the 3.5mm audio jack is an output, not an input. I get that most people are using HDMI or the displayport itself for audio, and that's all fine and good. But on a hackintosh you're probably not because OSX support for hdmi audio is sketchy at best, it's preferable to use analog output. So 4 stars for not having an analog audio input, a minor inconvenience. Otherwise a great monitor for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: R. Clayton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME price! great monitor. FAST shipping. my father had no complaints about this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: AngelTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor and easy to install and get working. Received quickly with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: cory castle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3. running all 3 on x2 1080 MSI Seahawks..
customer_reviews.author: Zachary McBurney

customer_reviews.title: i enjoy using it daily but no height/tilt adjustments
customer_reviews.text: Pros: high quality, i enjoy using it daily Cons: A display stand with NO height or tilt adjustment. very disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. But I wish it had an on/off ...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. But I wish it had an on/off switch. Kinda strange it doesn't have one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D. Pettis

customer_reviews.title: the 4k pixels look amazing. But u need a way bigger screen
customer_reviews.text: the 4k pixels look amazing. But u need a way bigger screen. 24 inches u have to turn the scaling way up to see anything. I returned this and went with a 28in 4k. 28in is the minimum screen size for 4k
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Mac friendly
customer_reviews.text: If you are on a non-retina Mac pick a different monitor. It won't run above 30Hz at any resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: I chose this View Sonic HD LED 24-inch monitor for my Dell desktop. It's a huge step up from the monitor that came with my computer. It's a Crystal clear exceptional viewing experience when watching movies or TV shows. I love it for work as well as I work from home and it's larger than my old monitor. I can plug in My phone and view it on my monitor as well. It's pricey but it's pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Might be a great product, but without matching video card, it is only very good.
customer_reviews.text: This product is much more difficult to set up than I thought. The directions are not intuitive and not very well written. It also happens that my Microsoft Windows 7 computer doesn't have an appropriate video card and therefore, I cannot get the screen to its best resolutions. It is a nice looking product and the screen is bright. The crispness is lacking on my setup due to the video drivers not being compatible. Another reviewer mentions that the controls are not easy to use and that is an understatement. It is a snap to put together. As soon as I have another computer product to test it with, I will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Burgmicester

customer_reviews.title: Very good sharp screen
customer_reviews.text: Super sharp with good color but with the usual mysterious feel 'n' learn adjustment buttons on the bottom. Very good frame rate response for gaming but I feel strongly that the 28" would be a better size if you are going to go top-end for gaming or photo editing. It has a wide angle for view-ability. I ran a Spyder calibration and the factory calibration was very good, and hence this is great for Photoshop. The from-the-bottom adjustment buttons, in keeping with the slick, clean fascia of the monitor, was a little tricky to adjust. Overall I am very satisfied with the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan W. Ong

Size:24-InchThe View Sonic VX2475Smhl-4K is a 24” (23.6” viewable) Ultra HD LED monitor that delivers stunning definition for multimedia entertainment. With 3840x2160 resolution, Super Clear IPS technology for wide-angle viewing, 4ms response time, and an amazing 120M:1 dynamic contrast ratio, this monitor provides incredible images and lifelike video playback. Future-proof connectivity options include DisplayPort 1.2a and MHL for easy and flexible viewing options of high-definition content, while HDMI2.0 supports crystal-clear Ultra HD content at a 60Hz signal. Dual integrated 2W speakers deliver immersive sound for the ultimate multimedia experience. View Sonic's exclusive View Mode provides intuitive presets to deliver optimized screen performance in different applications. In addition, Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help to eliminate eye strain from extended viewing periods. With an energy-saving Eco-mode feature and ENERGY STAR compliance, the VX2475Smhl-4K delivers great power savings along with its stunning screen performance.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Ideal for Gaming, Entertainment & Photography/Graphics applications 24" (23.6" VIEWABLE) ULTRA HD MULTIMEDIA LED MONITOR
The ViewSonic VX2475Smhl-4K is a 24" (23.6" viewable) Ultra HD LED monitor that delivers stunning definition for multimedia entertainment. With 3840x2160 resolution, SuperClear PLS panel technology for wide-angle viewing, 4ms response time, and an amazing 120M:1 dynamic contrast ratio, this monitor provides incredible images and lifelike video playback. Future-proof connectivity options include DisplayPort 1.2a and MHL for easy and flexible viewing options of high-definition content, while HDMI2.0 supports crystal-clear Ultra HD content at a 60Hz signal. Dual integrated 2W speakers deliver immersive sound for the ultimate multimedia experience. ViewSonic's exclusive ViewMode provides intuitive presets to deliver optimized screen performance in different applications. In addition, Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help to eliminate eye strain from extended viewing periods. With an energy-saving Eco-mode feature and ENERGY STAR compliance, the VX2475Smhl-4K delivers great power savings along with its stunning screen performance.

PRIMARY FEATURES:

STUNNING ULTRA HD RESOLUTION
Displaying more than 8 million pixels with a high pixel density of 187 PPI, this Ultra HD 3840x2160 monitor delivers the ultimate in image detail and clarity for stunning, lifelike images. In addition, with 4x more pixels than Full HD resolution, this Ultra HD monitor maximizes productivity by displaying more content.


NEXT GENERATION CONNECTIVITY
Future-proof HDMI 2.0 and DisplayPort 1.2a video standards support 3840x2160 resolution at a quick 60Hz frame rate-guaranteeing jitter-free multimedia, smooth screen performance, and true Ultra HD picture clarity.


SUPERCLEAR PLS PANEL TECHNOLOGY
Enjoy accurate and vivid colors with consistent levels of brightness no matter your vantage point! With SuperClear PLS panel technology, this monitor delivers the same image quality whether you are looking at the screen from above, below, the front, or the side.


A LARGER SCREEN FOR MOBILE DEVICES
Integrated with MHL, this monitor enables users to connect compatible high definition mobile devices, such as smartphones and tablets, directly to the projector. This allows digital content from mobile devices to be viewed on a larger screen, while also simultaneously charging the batteries of the mobile device.


VIEWMODE
ViewSonic's unique ViewMode feature offers "Game," "Movie," "Web," "Text," and "Mono" presets. These presets enhance gamma curve, color temperature, contrast, and brightness to deliver an optimized viewing experience for different screen applications.

SECONDARY FEATURES:
4MS RESPONSE TIME
With an ultra-fast 4 millisecond response time, this monitor delivers smooth images without streaking, blurring or ghosting. Experience digital broadcast-quality, full-motion video with razor-sharp images that never blur.

ENHANCED VIEWING COMFORT
Flicker-Free technology and a Blue Light Filter help to eliminate eye strain from extended viewing periods.

DUAL INTEGRATED STEREO SPEAKERS
Designed with dual integrated speakers, this monitor combines incredible screen performance with stereo sound for an immersive multimedia experience.

VESA-COMPATIBLE MOUNT DESIGN
Mount the monitor as you see fit using its convenient 100 x 100mm VESA-compatible mount design.

3-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY
Have peace of mind in the quality and reliability of your ViewSonic monitor-backed by the industry's leading pixel performance policy and a 3-year limited warranty.

CONSERVE ENERGY
With an energy-saving Eco-mode feature and ENERGY STAR compliance, this monitor delivers great power savings along with its stunning screen performance.
